text: is a Japanese footballer who plays for Tokushima Vortis. ==Career== After attending Sanno Institute of Management, Hamashita joined Tochigi SC in December 2017.https://www.tochigisc.jp/info/9105 At the end of 2019, he signed with Tokushima Vortis.浜下 瑛選手 完全移籍にて加入内定のお知らせ, vortis.jp, 28 December 2019 ==Club statistics== Updated to end of 2018 season.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 241 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
